website_summaries.verdict: A portable dog pool that helps take the guesswork out of keeping your dog cool, comfortable and clean.
pros: PVC construction ensures the pool is built to last
Slip-resistant material on the bottom of the pool enables a dog to stand or sit comfortably
Sold in 5 sizes, making the pool a great option for dogs of all sizes
cons: Pool can be difficult to clean
Flimsy and thin in comparison to similar options

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool for my pup
customer_reviews.text: My senior 98 pound Golden Retriever LOVES his new pool! It's the best day he's had in months when we filled it with water and toys for the first time! Large is a good size for a big dog. Get XL is you want to have a doggie pool party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - edited review
customer_reviews.text: Dog loved it, but There is already a leak. Only used twice and have to through it in the trash! Edit: the customer service for this product is wonderful. They offered to send me a new pool, however, I preferred a refund. They happily obliged. I will buy from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DiStefano

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought one it leaked, sent it back with no problem, got another that leaked. But the seller was really awesome, and worked with me, now I have a really nice pool for my boys/dogs. It's the best pool I've gotten so far for them. It seems really sturdy and looks great as well! Very pleased in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: pool delight
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! This is a hot pup's or any dog's dream (within reason). Our Golden is SO happy with this. We had used the hard plastic kiddie pools in the past. This is durable to withstand dog nails and sides soft enough to jump over but firm enough to stand well. I know it's early in our purchase but this one looks like it's going to be with us and our happy "3 year-old" for a long time to come
customer_reviews.author: Shani B. Baldauf

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Filled the pool with water, and the walls started to collapse outward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Not good for dogs. At least those who want to play and jump in and out. Sides ripping after 30 mins of use. Assume from jumping in and out. She did not chew it as I was out side with her. Total waste of money. Can comment on how it cleans and folds back up because we didn’t get that far...
customer_reviews.author: Sam Cancilla

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for doggie bath time!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Medium & it is the perfect size for my German Shepherd and Am. Bulldog. Bottom is thick enough for nails not to puncture. It also has some traction so they didn't slip or slide at all. Good up nicely for storage. Only negative thing would be that the storage bag is quite thin and won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Tom + Jen Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: yellow lab and we actually could have gotten by easily with the medium
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large pool for my son's 90 lb. yellow lab and we actually could have gotten by easily with the medium. It's very sturdy, love that it can fold up small for storage in the cold months. Would happily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kay

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome. My bullie overheats easily and this pool is ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Where has this pool been all my bulldogs life?! It's awesome. My bullie overheats easily and this pool is collapsible, foldable AND comes with it's own carry bag! I can't keep him out - even WITHOUT water, lol! I love this pool and so does Turkey!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not for energetic dogs...don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 month old husky since he has an interest in splashing the water in his water bowl... this pool did not last a day ! It’s not meant for dogs who are playful. The base of the pool is very thin, it’s like the material of a normal inflatable pool. I only bought this because Of the ease to put it away after its use and how it’s advertised that it is dog friendly. My dog started pawing at the water and it instantly ripped . Next time I’ll just buy a plastic kiddie pool.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: I liked at first
customer_reviews.text: **Update. This pool is pretty much useless. It's 2 months old! This pool seemed great at first. But gradually it has started really tipping and folding over. It tends to flop if there is less water in it. It also gets very dirty and is so bulky that it is hard to tip and rinse out. My dog has certainly enjoyed it but I see several issues, outlined above. I will say that it is easy to drain and is a good size, but that's about all that is good about it. We've used it for about a month now. As you can see from the picture it is really leaning on one side.
customer_reviews.author: kayceedee

customer_reviews.title: Pockets of water where boards were
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this pool because my dogs love water but after the first few fills i noticed the pockets that held the boards had bubbles of water in them as if the water was seeping in. I drained the pool and let it sit for a few days hoping the pockets would drain but they never did. I returned the pool because I wasnt taking a chance on those pockets getting moldy over the winter for the price that i paid.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: My golden retriever loves his pool!
customer_reviews.text: This pool is easy to set up.... first I set it up on the grass but when the dog jumped in and out I found the water got muddy really quick. Now it's set up on the deck and he will play by himself for an hour or so - - so funny. I put some plastic balls/toys in the pool and he just splashes around. Great way to beat the heat!
customer_reviews.author: S K.

customer_reviews.title: Best pool ever
customer_reviews.text: This pool is perfect. I bought the xxl. It’s perfect for my 90lb chocolate Labrador
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our new puppy just LOVES this. Being a labradoodle, he is drawn to the water, and we bought this so he will opt to swim on our deck rather than at our pond. We are careful to watch him, so that he does NOT chew on the pool itself. We got the medium size and it fits all twenty three pounds of him, and will still fit him as an adult dog. He just loves splashing in it, and we even play dunk for apples! The drainplug holds back the water, but is easy to drain when needed. It folds up, so would be great to take and move around. WONDERFUL product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adamcyk

customer_reviews.title: No no no.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was great until I realized it wasn't holding water. I contacted the company and they wanted photo proof. Ummm? It's wet around the pool and the sides are caving in because there's no water in it anymore. Does that work? I would not recommend this product. I'm out the money I paid for it and it's a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: prairieclover

customer_reviews.title: I do love that it is tough as neither of my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: When this is FULL of water it works well when it isn't full it doesn't work well as the walls fall in on itself. I do love that it is tough as neither of my dogs or the kids have managed to put a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time trying to decide what size to get we have a full grown golden retriever and is still growing seven month old chocolate lab. I finally decided the best thing to do was to go for the extra extra large and that is exactly what we needed. It is easy for them to get in and out of and it seems to be pretty well-made . So I’m going to say so far so good and they both seem to enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lynn

customer_reviews.title: One of My Favorite Amazon Purchases
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I got a medium for my 95lb Shar Pei / Boxer Mix and it is perfect for him. My sister brought her dogs over the other day and my dog and her 90lb German Shepherd laid in it together without being cramped. On top of it they had a blast. My dog HATES any weather over 70 degrees so I knew he needed a pool. He is rough on things and I can tell this pool is going to withstand him.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I have a wonderful 72lb pitty bundle of water loving dog
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I think I may have done 1 or 2 reviews in all my years with Amazon, but this purchase warrants a review! I have a wonderful 72lb pitty bundle of water loving dog, we have gone through countless reinforced soft or hard plastic pools, most pools last hours before being clawed to death or chewed up mess, some have managed a few days. But now Scooby, has found his zen pool! No leaks with his crazy digging at the bottom of pool, biting at edges, this pool all good! Was pleasantly surprised with the resilience of this pool, didn't think it would survive the Scoobinator, but he's sooo happy with his pool!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Munro-Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kid Pool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 9 and she loves it! Easiest set up ever. Requires no blowing up or pump. You just unfold it and make sure the drain cap is on tight and it already came set up! Just turn on the hose and voila! 😃 I would recommend this. As a tall grown adult, I could even sit in there with her. I haven’t had to clean it yet. I will is a tarp as a cover to keep it clean. It arrived in less than a week. I read to add baking soda to keep it clean. She brought in toys to play and is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for cooling off the pup!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the XL (55-inch) pool for our puppy who will grow into it. It is very sturdy and is holding up really well. We have used it several days in a row. The pup tries to bite the sides but the material is thick enough so she doesn't do any damage and I am working on correcting that behavior :). It is heavy, and since I bought the XL, probably not as portable as I was anticipating, but I will bring it on longer travel stays when I know it will be hot. Well worth the investment! Photo shows puppy, who is growing fast, in the pool at two different times about 4 weeks apart.
customer_reviews.author: JeanMarieJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, durable!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this pool, its very easy to set up, bring down, clean and my pup hasn't shredded it yet which is huge! We normally get the bigger plastic ones from dollar general and they have holes within a week... I only wish it were bigger. Yes its held up great so far but it's the xxl and the same size as the dollar general one only 50 some more dollars..... The expense will be totally worth it if it lasts the summer!! We'll see!! Update: still going strong!!! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Nice, storable pool for kids & pups
customer_reviews.text: This pool is just the right height & size for medium size dogs/puppies. Easy to drain, clean & store. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our 80 lb German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our 80 lb German Shepherd. Love that it folds up for storage, we live in the north and only need it for a few months in summer, but really great quality, could be used for kids as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Dog Pool
customer_reviews.text: This dog pool is awesome! Our 2 year old German Shepherd loves his playtime in the backyard with the hose and pool! It is especially great on our 100+ weather! He looks forward to water play daily. It is constructed well and my only concern was that he might damage it with his nails, or he would step on the sides. Neither thing has happened. He happily jumps in and out!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed in less than a week!!!!! Money down the drain!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My golden year and a half golden retreiver destroyed it is less than 1 week. Poorly made for large dogs!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!! Other neighborhood dogs are jealous.
customer_reviews.text: We got the extra large for our golden retriever and he's pretty big sized. and still there's plenty of room for him to splash around. Pool is also more durable than the common pools you get at the local stores so no worries about a puncture from his nails. Easy to drain and clean, best buy so far this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wading pool
customer_reviews.text: I love how small it folds up! Probably we could have gotten the next size up but this works great too!
customer_reviews.author: Theresag_nyc

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend not purchasing this in case you have to return ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was small for the price and my dog would barely fit in it. I tried to return it and they wanted to charge almost $15 for return postage. I highly recommend not purchasing this in case you have to return it because you will only get half of your money back. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great place for a dog to have fun and cool down
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great purchase. It came very quickly, quicker than I expected and it arrived in one day. I decided to purchase this for my 10 lb Shih Tzu because she likes to wait and run around in large puddles at the park . I decided to go with the extra large size because I wanted to be able to sit in the pool with her too. We set it up and so far it's sturdy and my dog had a lot of fun running around in there. It's also big enough for me to sit in there with her. I like that it's foldable and easy to put away. now all I need is a pool cover.
customer_reviews.author: Magz

customer_reviews.title: Fun purchase, not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My Pup loves water apparently. I got the Large size which is really just enough space for him to splash around in. Still takes a while to fill, he gets it dirty quick so I empty the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I currently use it as a small pond for my ducks so you can imagine it gets quite dirty fairly quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY durable pool. I currently use it as a small pond for my ducks so you can imagine it gets quite dirty fairly quickly. Just using a scrub brush and some water gets all the nasty stuff off and then it’s good as new again! Super durable, we’ve gone through 2 of those plastic kids pools already and this is the only thing that’s withstood the elements for our specific purpose. The drain is also super helpful in messy clean ups :). Overall a great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Easy use!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love how I can fold this up easily. My Aussie is so happy to have this poll in her back yard! It’s perfect for summer when we play outside with the frisbee, she takes a break and just stretches out in the cool water. Unfortunately she got has a laceration & can’t get in the water until it heals. I was so impressed on how it was easy to empty into the grass & wipe dry for storage. I did notice it already had faded from the sun after being outside for 1 week. I’ll report back on how sturdy the material is after 1 summer season in CO.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Really tough and accommodates giant breed dog
customer_reviews.text: Stands up to my 120 lb pup playing. He hasn’t tried to chew on it, so I can’t say it would hold up to chewers. He’s been jumping in and out of this for weeks now, plays with his ball in it and really paws at the bottom. No rips. This thing is really tough! Big enough for giant breed dogs as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: MamaSal72

customer_reviews.title: Dog keeps ripping the cap off
customer_reviews.text: So far the pool part of this is great. But my dog easily pops the drain cap off. I find the pool out of water and have to search my yard for the drain cap. I put it back on, she pulls it off when I am not looking, the pool drains and repeat. If you guys could make a better cap this product would be great! But it doesn't work for my dog now. I have it so she can play in the water and cool off when it gets warm. but If the plug to the drain is continually being removed, well, it's just a large piece of plastic I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for dogs of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3month old lab that I wanted to start introducing to water on hot summer day. It was perfect because 1. He likes to chew everything and this one cant pop and doesn't seem like it would puncture easily. 2. The sides kind of fold down if he was slowly getting in but then I could easily reform it. 3. Super easy set up and clean up. Now I don't have to have a huge ugly plastic pool propped up on the side of my house. I got the XL size. It is perfect not too big but I know he'll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: LBella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for medium-sized dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My Frenchie loves her new pool! I was hesitant to buy this item instead of a typical plastic kiddie pool, but this one surpassed expectations. Once you fill it with water, it's very sturdy and looks great on the patio too, just like in the product photos. Medium size is big enough for my French bulldog; she can lie down in it and still has additional room to move around. A must buy for the hot Florida climate!
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Held water great. No holes
customer_reviews.text: Held water great. No holes. It's nice that it has a drain and it folds up. It's shallow but my 3 dogs like going in on a hot day. We have only used it a few times so I can't say yet how it holds up over time. One word of advice- don't forget to empty EVERY time you use it! We left water in for the whole weekend one time and when we went to use it we noticed it was filled with thousands of like fly larva or something. So gross! Had to scrub clean. Other then that it's great as long as you empty and refill each time.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Did I get a dud? Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this pool. Thought it would be nice for my 3 year old. I was tired of blowing up pools. When we first inboxes unboxed it, it looked promising in our livingroom. When we first filled it I thought I found a gem. Unfortunately after about 20 mins the pool side s started to collapse from water pressure. Its not on a slope. Disappointed it was a total waste of money for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mama_Barela

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Our dog is old and can no ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Our dog is old and can no longer get in the bath tub. She can walk right into this one. We used it in our kitchen. I got the small and our dog is 60 pounds. When finished, I drug the tub out the back door and then cleaned it out with hose. I plan to use it outside once it warms up. Very sturdy and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: XXL SIZE GREAT FOR MEDIUM/LARGE DOG
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical when I opened it and saw that it was a little smaller than I imagined, but then again, I didn't realize that 63 inches is just over 5 ft in diameter. Well, I filled it with water from the hose (took about 10-15 minutes)... And then let my dog jump in! She's a 6 month old Samoyed. Let me just say... Excellent purchase for a pup! She loved it in this 90+ degree heat!!! Highly recommend for your furry friends! I would say that this XXL sized pool is great for one medium/large dog, but I'm sure that you could have 2-3 in it total!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It's better than just a swimming pool
customer_reviews.text: I thought that my 100+lb pit would love his own swimming pool since he enjoys it so much at daycare. Actually, with water in it, he thinks it's a super cool drinking bowl. With the water out of it, he thinks it's a super cool place to take a nap in the warm sunshine. Either way, it's a well-made product, easy to set up and clean up, and it folds up easily into an easy to store size. Everybody's happy here!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: My German shepherd loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this in a few days ago! My German shepherd loves it! Makes giving her a bath so much easier than in the tub. Easy to plug in the garden hose and water the flowers with the used water too. Feels extremely durable and will last
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Dog Pool
customer_reviews.text: This dog pool is no good. I put the pool on a flat part of the yard where I use to have a 18 foot above ground pool and filled it up with water. My dog in it and was just walking around in it and the vinyl between one of the side boards split and the water just poured out. This pool is nothing like what they say it is. I do not recommend buying this pool. I paid $65.00 for this pool just to watch my dog play in it for about 15 minutes. I would like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: NO HOSE INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: If buying for the patent pending hose option to drain, don’t. Is no hose included, check the fine print...I failed to see that. Does not drain with a hose, it drains right where it sits.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mehalick

customer_reviews.title: Leaked the first time I filled it, came with holes in it.
customer_reviews.text: Reason I gave 2 stars is because the first time I filled the pool it leaked because there was holes already in it. For the cost I don’t think it should immediately need repairs. Since the pool comes with a patch kit I decided to just patch them instead of going through the hassle of returning and replacing it. I won’t be recommending this pool to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: It’s mostly a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love that the pool is easy to store. I don’t like how difficult it is to empty it. If you have an area where the flooding to empty it is no big deal then that is perfect. If not, the hose idea doesn’t work. It just makes it hard to use and reuse it. I don’t like letting the water sit in it so I ultimately will not be using this as much as I hoped. Also after your first time filling it, the walls won’t stand on their own so you have to remain hunched over and utilize some yoga moves to keep the walls up until it fills to a certain point.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytelyn Koutros

customer_reviews.title: Not for a dog that chews lol
customer_reviews.text: This pool is perfect easily set up!!!! BUT IF YOU HAVE A DOG THAT CHEWS DONT SPEND THE MONEY!!!!!! My yellow lab did great with it when I was SUPERVISING!!!! My boyfriend let him out by himself and he chewed the knob that holds the water in and destroyed the liner. If you’re dog is a chewed and you supervise the whole time go for it!!!!!!! But if you’re not going to watch your dog then don’t buy it!!! We got it today and it didn’t even last 8 hours :-( but 5 stars for the pool 0 stars for my dog lmao
customer_reviews.author: Kaeleigh kulko

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed: Good size but burned my grass
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately had to return this item. Bought XL and size was perfect for family. However sides bend easily so hard to lift up to drain excess water! More importantly after draining left on grass to dry completely for a couple of hours in 85 degree weather. Burnt my grass in a huge cycle in middle of my yard! I had read reviews and no one mentioned this! Was shocked to see my lawn ruined! It had just rained a couple days earlier so grass was not that dry! Went back to my $15 pool from walmart and no problem burning grass! :( Amazon handled return easily! :)
customer_reviews.author: Joell M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this product, BUT just found out a small rodent chewed a hole in bottom to get at the water. That just happen overnight, as I filled it yesterday and all was fine. I have a German shepherd and a mixed cattle dog and both love it and never all this time put a hole in it. The only thing I had a problem with was try to fill and clean it as my Shepherd loves water. Otherwise it's great and as been a big help with the hot dry weather we have had. Bummer it shot.
customer_reviews.author: R. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your pup!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES water so when his old plastic kiddie pool warped and cracked from years of use, we knew we had to get something to last. This pool has been AMAZING so far! My 80 lb Australian Shepherd and 35 lb mini Aussie can both fit comfortably and they love it! My 80 olb dog has knee problems and can get in and out of the pool just fine. Easy to clean and folds nicely. I really love that it was a drain for the pool instead of trying to dump it out. I will be recommending to all of my friends who are looking for a pool for their pups.
customer_reviews.author: gimmemygoods

customer_reviews.title: My dog chewed the top of brand new pool but still usable. Then the Bottom seam tore,
customer_reviews.text: I'm so angry at my 1-yr-old dog! She ate the pool. I filled it with three inches of water for her and her friend Dory next door. My Annie was out in the back yard alone for the 8 minutes it took her to chew the top of the pool and eat it. 8 minutes is all it to get my chair out of the garage while she feasted. The pool still worked fine until 3 days ago. It leaked on the bottom seam. The heat seal separated and won't hold water. Buy a hard plastic pool and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Mori

customer_reviews.title: This dipping/wading pool works well to cool off our large
customer_reviews.text: We've had this about a month. This dipping/wading pool works well to cool off our large, 100 lb lab. She's old and needs calling off in summer. The 11-inch high sidewall holds the water - but doesn't trip up our aging lab. It's a great height. The pool is easy to fill, empty, and clean. Seems to be rather sturdily built and I expect it should last rather well.
customer_reviews.author: Eggie

customer_reviews.title: Not sturday
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pool as the reviews were good and we wanted a deeper pool for our dogs. It started our great, but 1 month of use (maybe they are in it a few minutes a day) the sides are buckling. It is cheaply made and for $10 you can by a hard plastic kiddie pool that will last at least a summer. The only good point and made it a two star it the hose attachment. Able to use the water to water ground plants. Very disappointed otherwise. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Think I’ve found the one!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found something that seems like it will last! For the price, I sure hope it does! We have been going through kiddie pools every year and couldn’t find one this year, but stumbled across this one and it does the job for my kids! We just received it so can’t rate on how well it holds up yet, but will update when we’ve had it for a while. It’s easy to fold, sides stay up when filling with water and love that it has a little side plug to help drain the water!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Poliseno

customer_reviews.title: Pool replaced and perfect for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: We got our new pool today and it’s great. We had ordered one, but it leaked. The company emailed me and offered to resolve the issue by replacing the pool. The second one doesn’t leak. My dog love this. I recommend. It’s easier to drain than a plastic kiddie pool and easy to fold up and put away. Upon draining it, I take a towel and lightly dry the visible wetness. After that I put it upside down for a bit, (I’m a little crazy about drying it fully,) and I fold it up and put it away so it doesn’t get dirty. I really appreciate the company for reaching out. They have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Peirce

customer_reviews.title: Doggo approved
customer_reviews.text: My golden retrievers love this! I used to buy the cheap hard plastic pools from the hardware store for the summer, but they got torn up and just generally didn’t last very well. I also feel like this keeps the water cooler longer than the hard plastic pools. It also holds both goldens with some room (60lb and 110lb’s).
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Not limited to using for animals.
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure- I bought this as a kids pool bc my 3 boys destroy regular kiddie pools, so needed something a bit more substantial. It was super easy to open up and fill. Draining was also a breeze (can’t leave filled pools outside overnight in our housing area). The pool came with a little repair kit, but my concern, and why I marked it down- is that the sides don’t seem super sturdy. They feel like they are made out of a harder piece of cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Size-great, material-not great
customer_reviews.text: So I was super excited about this dog pool! It’s a perfect size for my 2 pit bulls. 1st time using it, I clipped their nails so they wouldn’t poke a hole, used it for the day then drained it and put it away to ensure it wouldn’t get torn! 2nd time using it 1/2 is caving in and won’t stand up straight and there is a very slow leak around the whole entire bottom rim of the pool. Will be returning product and buying a cheapo plastic pool.
customer_reviews.author: Shantelle

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid pool perfect for pups of all sizes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog pool! Very sturdy and setup was a breeze! I wasn’t sure what size to get but I opted to get the XXL since my girl (she’s the blue brindle splashing around) is a 44lb pit x staffordshire Bull terrier mix and my boy is a 66lb American Staffordshire Bull Terrier. There was plenty of room for both of them to lay in the pool and still splash around! My girl didn’t even wait for me to finish filling the pool before hopping in but it’s withstood her enthusiasm. Great purchase for keeping them cool in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids too
customer_reviews.text: Great pool! Using it for kids not dogs, not sure why it’s marketed as a dog bathtub. Pops right open, sturdy, really easy to fold (flip it over and accordion fold it in from next to the plug). Only weird thing is that the drain is a bit high- leaves at least 1-2 inches of water that you have to work to get out the drain or dump over the sides. Maybe there’s a structural reason for that. My kids are having a blast with this pool.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great Kiddie Pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool for my 18 month old daughter to replace her plastic one. I love this pool and will never buy a plastic pool again. The pool is made from strong, thick flexible plastic. The sides have plastic wedges in them to prevent the sides from caving in on itself. The bottom is soft and slip resistant. This pool is very easy to clean, drain (screw drain plug on the side of the pool) dry and fold to put away. It takes up such little space and it so worth the price. I was a little surprise by the size, since it's smaller than a plastic kiddie pool, but the size actually worked out great for her! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Already got leak somewhere
customer_reviews.text: We received this pool May 29 and put up around June 5th. Has been leaking soon after that and kept filling it thinking it was the heat. Couldn’t find leak so still don’t know why it’s leaking. Time for returning up on July 1st. We have one dog, a Jack Russell that is the only one using pool just to get his feet wet so this hasn’t been used much at all. Very, very disappointed with this pet pool.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: we really did NOT need this... especially the larger size
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead & bought the bigger size on this, thinking my dog & his pals could enjoy it in our back yard in hot Texas. As it turns out, I don't really want to waste the water to fill it, & my dog is not a big water-lover. We rarely have his pals over, and I don't want them getting their paws all muddy & coming into our home afterwards, so I really should not have purchased this. It seems to work fine, but does require a lot of water & can cause other issues (like mud). I will probably donate it to an animal shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the dogs!
customer_reviews.text: As picture are my two larger retreivers in the pool & then another with our retriever and two pugs for size reference. We ordered the size large- 63” x 12” and it’s a really decent size. The material is a decently thicker vinyl. I have zero concerns about puncturing the vinyl since I keep up with my dogs nail trimmings. The sides are sturdy. This pool is great to have, we like that there’s a cap to release the water. To avoid mildew growth inside, the pool does need to be dried out in order to fold up and store. It’s a tad on the Bulkier side, however still much more convenient than a plastic kiddie pool.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Marie

customer_reviews.title: Large Foldable Dog Bed/Bath
customer_reviews.text: Originally I got this and filled it up. My dog would step in it and climb right back out. Realized the next day water leaked out overnight. So diappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: My golden never wants to get out of this pool!
customer_reviews.text: We have an 8 month of Golden Retriever puppy and live in Florida, so we were looking for something that would allow him to play around in and cool off without having to jump in the big pool. This was perfect! He absolutely loves and never wants to get out. We watch him as he runs around the yard, jumps in this pool, then jumps out, runs around and heads right back in. It is very easy to assemble and take down and fold and is very sturdy. I would highly recommend this product for your canine! They will love it. It is a great product that we would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry O.

customer_reviews.title: Love it (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: Updated : Our husky accidentally clawed where the side meets the bottom the second time using the pool :( He gets his nails trimmed but I suppose they were still too sharp. The patch material provided isn't big enough (and the position isn't suitable to patch anyways) so we can't use the pool anymore and for only two uses it wasn't worth that money... So lesson learned that the material on the bottom is very easily torn. Does exactly what I expected! Our two husky/malamutes love it. They can fit together in it, wrestle, have fun! It was easy to unfold and set up then easy to untwist the cap off to drain as well. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kirby

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing product highly recommend it. I had to return ours because our dogs apparently hates water. But the quality is fantastic and the customer service is beyond outstanding. The setup and takedown happened within seconds. Definitely thinking about buying this pool again in extra large size for my daughter who enjoyed it as well but a medium was way too small for her size :-)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not for German shepherds
customer_reviews.text: This pool is not meant for large active dogs. The sides are flimsy and the pool needs to be filled at least 3/4 for the sides to remain standing. When my German Shepherd (70LB female) would lay in the pool on one side, the other side wall would collapse. The cardboard sides, due to the plastic disintegrating, didn’t with stand the constant jumping in and out of large dogs. The quality is poor. The plastic covering the cardboard sides dried, ripped, and fell apart with in 2 weeks during the Phoenix,AZ summer. This pool was meant for young kids in cooler climates.
customer_reviews.author: Michell S

customer_reviews.title: Began sagging and walls won't stay up, even with little to no use
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews mention this same exact issue. Initially, it held up fine. We did not use it much. A little over three weeks in, the walls began sagging and caving in, and there's no way to keep them up unless you fill it all the way to the top. The walls sag again considerably after some water displacement when someone gets out of the pool. Of course, this all began happening after the return window closed, so I cannot exchange or get a refund, and I'm really disappointed. It ended up being a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as Baby Pool!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Perfect for my grandbabies on these hot Texas days we are experiencing! Just the right size, not too deep, and cleans in a jiffy! Very nice and sturdy! Folds easily for travel if we happen to go out of town, or to the lake. Easy enough to tote along so they don't have to miss out on cooling off and having a good time! Lovely product, and not just for dogs! My grandsons will attest to that! Overall--product shipped in a timely manner. Arrived in new condition. Very sturdy and durable. Very satisfied with this purchase, and price point! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: pixiejen

customer_reviews.title: Not just for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 and 6 year old grandchildren after wasting so much money on blow up kiddie pools. This is built to last. The dark lining helps the water heat up faster. Love that ot folds up and the drain that can convert to a drain hose is what really sold me. No more wasted water. I just wish they had included a hose. If the drain could be connected to a garden hose it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: m.morelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, Doesn’t Last
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this pool. I thought it would be great to be able to drain it instead of trying to tip over our big plastic kiddie pool. I also loved the idea of being able to fold it up and save it from year to year. Our first one arrived damaged and we appreciate amazon making it right. However, our new one did not hold up more than a day. It’s already damaged from one of our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Best pool for kiddos—-and dogs will love it, too!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a wading pool for my two-year old grandson when he visits has been impossible. You thought it was tough finding toilet tissue!! But I stumbled on this dog pool and I thought “If it’s strong enough for a big dog, it’s going to handle my little guy.” The material is super durable, the sides are high enough (and much stronger than an inflatable pool) and, best of all, it folds up for easy storage. Oh, and there’s a drain on the side, so you can get rid of the water without trying to lift the pool to dump it. An absolutely great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and put away
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a extra play area for my guinea pigs and during full cage clean up. Easy to clean and put away. The walls are short so if you have a jumper I wouldn't recommend. The stitching and material are sturdy and well made. I would recommend cleaning right away, air drying, and store in dry area away from heat or direct sun. It will extend the life. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ErLoGe177

customer_reviews.title: My Labs Love It!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this pool has been great. I bought the XXL version for my two labs, and it’s a lot lighter than I thought it would be. It’s easy to pull out and put away, which is a huge deal for me. Cleaning the dirt out is a little more difficult since it is so large and wants to fold when there’s no water, but it’s not too bad. My dogs have absolutely loved it, and are constantly jumping in and out of it, scratching the bottom, etc. And I haven’t seen any signs of wear or breakdown. I’m really happy with this pool, and my pups are too!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My little girls are loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2 and 4 year old to play in and other than complaints about the water being cold, they're enjoying it very much! I like that it's easy to fill and empty, rinse out and store away. The thing I'm concerned about is the bottom getting a hole in it. I'm being careful to have only non-sharp toys in it and keep it clean, rinsing it every day or two days. I think the price is a little steep (third one I've bought, from different sellers) but overall I'm pleased with the purchase for what I'm using it for. My dog ate the one I bought for them!😐
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Uses As Oversized Water Bowl
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a large water bowl for my dog for a long time. He can drink from it very well and won't do anything but drink from it. This water bowl is so big that a 5 foot woman can fit in it while the dog won't even try to get in, because who swims in his personal oversized water bowl? It is pretty sturdy and has one or two small tears in a few weeks if use but not to the extent that I had to patch. It will fold easily in the fall. Draining to get new drinking water into this bowl is a little bit hard sometimes as the valve could be lower.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin S.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed! Doesn’t hold shape!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this pool. It doesn’t hold its shape (it is not filled passed the max fill line). and very quickly gets dirty and smells! Like within a week i had to empty and wash it down . And I bought a cover ..but cover was ripped when I bought it and was too small for the pool! And it was the cover that was suggested for it ! Don’t recommend especially for the price it cost ! I’ll keep Buying $5 baby pools for my pups ! Algae accumulates quickly in this pool...so gross! My dogs don’t like to go in it either as the water turns hot so quickly and algae gathers!
customer_reviews.author: Camryn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool (size XL), but leaks.  Buying another hoping for good luck.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pool but as soon as I filled it, I noticed it leaking from the seam! I am returning it and have bought another which should arrive tomorrow. I hope doesn't leak, because this pool is perfect for our red-eared slider turtle. It got good reviews as a dog pool, so I'm hoping I will get lucky and get one that doesn't leak. This is the XL size.
customer_reviews.author: Marda McDermed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pool - Our ducks love it!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The best duckie pool ever! Yep - our ducks love it!! It’s super easy to drain and clean - which is pretty much all the time with the duckies swimming in it! It’s just a tiny bit too tall so we had to build up one side of the ground and add a little step for them to get in and out - but other than that it works absolutely perfect for ducks! LOL! Much easier to work with than those cheap hard plastic kiddie pools - I would highly recommend this for any critters to use! DUCKS LOVE IT!! Fantastic product!!! Will definitely be buying another one!! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Eponeez Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Wish it drained more of the water...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this pool at first. It is a great size for my pitbull and hound and keeps them cool in the summer heat. However, it leaves *several* inches of water when you open the drain. So I still find myself struggling to dump the rest of the water out to clean it. Kind of a huge pain for the price. But you can sit there and hold a flap down to finish draining it I guess
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL 55” and it was extremely easy to set up. You literally just pull it open. It does take a while to fill up even a couple of inches, which is a pain when you have impatient toddlers waiting. My 3 year old a 1 year old love it. Their 7 and 9 year old cousins think it’s great as well. It is easy to drain, though the drain is 2-3” above the bottom of the pool, so you’ll need to tip the pool to completely drain it. Extremely easy to fold up. The quality seems good and I love how compact it is and easy to store. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea, not so much the execution.
customer_reviews.text: I have two bulldogs so I wanted to purchase this for them rather then the usually kiddie pool that only lasts a couple weeks. I love the idea that it can be folded up and put away. I also love the idea that it has a drain. Unfortunately, the drain is located 2-3 inches above ground so there is still a substantial amount of water left in the pool once the water is below the drain level making it hard to drain the rest of the water left. I ordered the 48” pool. Hindsight, I should have ordered A smaller one so my short legged bulldogs could get in/out easier.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My lab LOVES this pool!
customer_reviews.text: I have a one year old, 60 lb, black english labrador. He absolutely loves to play in water. It’s hot hot hot here in the Midwest and we don’t have much shade around our house. He gets hot real quick. He’s too big for his little plastic kiddie pool so I wanted something bigger for him to enjoy. I chose this one based on the construction and other reviews. So far it’s great! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good for big dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Golden Pyrenees. Easy to pack and store. Good value for the cost compared to others I looked at. I mainly needed it to be compact because we don’t have much storage. We have two huge dogs and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pool and great  customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy well built pool thats tough enough for my 3 dogs. I ended up buying the XL for my 3 pups that are 40,60, and 70 pounds. All 3 of them can fit in the pool together which is perfect. I ended up having to contact customer service for the smaller drain plug cap and they were very prompt in helping me. Definitely recommend the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sturdavant

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this pool for my fur baby!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13-year-old golden retriever who loves this pool. It’s very sturdy yet flexible. I never worry about her nails making a hole in it because it’s built so well. Easy to drain and fold up. I only fill it on the hot days and put it away when not in use although you would not have to. We got the 39 1/2 inch and is perfect for my golden to lay down in. If you have the room for the larger one and a dog who wants to play in it, you might want to go with a bigger one. This is the best pool we’ve ever had for our dog so I obviously highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Wise-Author

customer_reviews.title: Make sure u introduce ur dog slowly or they might think its a bath
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Sure wish my dog didnt think bgg it was a bath and run from it though!! LOL If your dog might be afraid of a bath I suggest dont put water in it at 1st and let them get used to the empty pool 1st. Maybe sput treats and snacks in there and then slowly introduce water. We're still hoping our dog comes around because this is a quality pool! (We got the large though and it was still a bit small but its fine. The husband and the teenage was in there trying to get him in the water so lol). -the wife.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool Pool for your Pet
customer_reviews.text: The pool is very easy to set up and durable. My dog absolutely loves it! Due to its size (63".D x 11.8".H,) and collapsible sides, it is rather difficult to clean especially if you are vertically challenged like me lol. The sides fold in and are held up with the water but when you need to dry for storage you will have to prop open to ensure it dries completely. I recommend if the pool is set on any type of decline to make sure the spout is on the lower end to help with releasing the water.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pool since April 22nd, 2020. Today is June 3rd, 2020. This pool was great when we got it but it is now quickly losing the “tight” siding. It is bowing out. Who knows how much longer it’ll last. We do not fill above fill line and we have followed directions. Very disappointed. I paid way too much for a pool to “give out” this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin DePauw

customer_reviews.title: way better than inflatable
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for a quarantine days activity to beat the summer heat and it’s fantastic. so easy to fold up and haul around. i took it to a backyard social distance pool party hang (byo pool) and it was so much easier than worrying about something to inflate and deflate. we also threw it in the car and took it to the beach so we could have a little pool for my nephew at the house in order to avoid public pools during the days of coronavirus. it’s been a great investment during these hot days when we are all more or less stuck at home.
customer_reviews.author: hannah westphall

customer_reviews.title: Great for the summer but expect quality issues after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some relief to this insane heat in lock down. And it turns out my dog loves the water too. This is durable since it has no inflatable parts however the seams on the side walls are prone to rips. Especially when emptying the pool. Also, it came with some nozzle head bits so you could attach a hose but it doesn't fit our hose. Also not sure how to attach it when the pool is full. It's not clear and the pool came with no instructions. So don't rely on that bit. Otherwise, it's a great pool that rolls up for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Miller

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy golden retriever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 120lb golden retriever who is so jealous when we all go into the human pool in backyard I decided to buy her this. I have never seen a dog so happy! She loves this pool! It’s big enough for her and a couple small kids. It’s very sturdy too. Easy to assemble and empty/put away! A must have for your dog if they like water!!!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect small pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for our grandbaby and it is so perfect. Far better than the one piece pools or inflatables and it folds up for storage. I can tell this will get us thru the toddler years and then I'll turn it into a sandbox for her. I was so impressed, I bought another for the granddog, whose mom lives in a condo in DC. The size is ideal for small spaces and the doggo is very happy as his devoted mom. BTW, the fact that I could even find and purchase a pool during the pandemic was miraculous! LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia N

customer_reviews.title: Best yet!
customer_reviews.text: This pool has been great. This is the 3rd one we've tried, and it is the only one not destroyed by my two large dogs. They love it and have not even tried to chew on it like they did the others. Love it, drains well, if had anything it would be that maybe drain could have been just a little lower, but not sure it that would have been possible. Would buy again if needed!
customer_reviews.author: dpclark007

customer_reviews.title: Great at first didnt hold up long!
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first, was easy to use and our big boy loved his pool for the hot AS weather! But as time passed the walls would no longer stay standing! I took extra care to make sure this pool lasted for a long time! But unfourntly it was pointless! Over time the walls begin to Collapse and I'm not sure why! Wish it would have lasted over a month as our Giant schnauzer loved his pool! He was very upset when it was unable to hold water! I paid a lot of money for only 1 1/2 mo of use! *Tried to upload a video but would not work*
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My Rottweilers loved the pool. I got the 48" siza and they were in the pool, at least once/day. Just cleaned and drained it and put it away and it was easy to do. Put it right back in the box it arrived in and will have it out next season. I was glad to see how well the pool held up with the large dogs. The drain makes it so much easier to empty than a plastic baby wading pool.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pollock

product_meta.title: Jasonwell Foldable Dog Pet Bath Pool Collapsible Dog Pet Pool Bathing Tub Kiddie Pool for Dogs Cats and Kids
feature_bullets: PORTABLE: foldable, easy to store and bring with you and your dog everywhere
SIMPLE:No need of inflation,set up in no time. With bottom/side drain, easy to drain and refresh water
SLIP RESISTANT & DURABLE: made of extra-tough PVC. Thicker slip resistant material on the bottom
Enviromentally friendly material: EN71,ASTM standard. Please TRIM your dogs' nails before using the pool.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
